column1: Yanliang District (simplified Chinese: 阎良区; traditional Chinese: 閻良區; pinyin: Yánliáng Qū) is one of nine districts of Xi'an
column3: China. The northernmost and least-populous of Xi'an's county-level divisions
column4: it borders the prefecture-level cities of Xianyang to the west and Weinan to the northeast and Lintong District to the south.

column1: Yanliang District was the site of the Qin capital of Yueyang.
